parameters.air_time: Amount of time spent in the air.
parameters.carrier:
Two letter carrier abbreviation. See airlines in the
nycflights13 package for more information or google the airline code.
parameters.origin,dest:
Origin and destination. See airports in the
nycflights13 package for more information or google airport the code.
parameters.dep_time,arr_time: Departure and arrival times, local tz.
parameters.dep_delay,arr_delay:
Departure and arrival delays, in minutes.
Negative times represent early departures/arrivals.
parameters.hour,minute: Time of departure broken in to hour and minutes.

title: Flights data
description:
Description
On-time data for a random sample of flights that departed NYC (i.e. JFK,
LGA or EWR) in 2013.
reference:
Hadley Wickham (2014). nycflights13: Data about flights departing
NYC in 2013. R package version 0.1.
format: A tbl_df with 32,735 rows and 16 variables:
